TitleEnglish: Tonari no Seki-kun: The Master of Killing Time
SummaryEnglish: The original manga revolves around a girl named Yokoi who sits next to a boy only known as Seki-kun. During class, Seki-kun continues to not pay attention and instead creates amazing little distractions, such as a detailed golf course with the course's hole being a dent in his desk, or an entire dramatic war being played out by paper shogi pieces. Yokoi often finds herself getting reluctantly interested in his games, even though they always seem to end up getting HER in trouble with the teacher!
SummaryJapanese: —とある学校の授業中。先生の目を盗んで机での一人遊びに興じる男子生徒・関くんと、そんな関くんの遊びを隣の席から観察(or妨害or参加)する女子生徒・横井さん。毎回予想外の展開を見せる関くんの遊び、さて今回は…

1.SummaryEnglish: OVA of Tonari no Seki-kun bundled with the fifth manga volume.
Yokoi-san is trying her best to listen in class, but she can't help but watch as Seki-kun is lining up erasers next to her. Seki-kun! Are thoses dominoes?!
1.SummaryJapanese: 真面目に授業を受けている横井さんだが、となりで黙々と消しゴムを並べる関くんが気になって仕方ない…。関くん！それって、ドミノ!?

2.SummaryEnglish: Yokoi-san is trying to pay attention as usual. And then Seki-kun starts playing shogi next to her and it turns into something rather unexpected.
2.SummaryJapanese: 真面目に授業を受けている横井さん。そのとなりで将棋の駒を並べている関くんだが、これが横井さんの思わぬ展開に!?

3.SummaryEnglish: Seki-kun starts shining his desk during class. Amazed at the effect of his work, Yokoi-san finds herself being dragged into his want to shine more desks.
3.SummaryJapanese: 授業中、机を磨き続ける関くん。それを気にしない様に努力する横井さんだが、エスカレートする関くんの机みがきに巻き込まれてしまう！？

4.SummaryEnglish: Seki-kun starts playing Go on his desk. Yokoi-san tries to ignore this since she doesn't know the rules, but this yet again turns into something rather unexpected.
4.SummaryJapanese: 机上で囲碁をする関くん。そんな関くんが気になりながらも授業に集中しようとする横井さんだが、これがとんでもない展開に！？

5.SummaryEnglish: During science class, Seki-kun is playing around quietly as usual, but an unexpected pest appears, putting Seki-kun in peril!
5.SummaryJapanese: 理科の授業中。いつもの様に黙々と遊ぶ関くんだったが、思わぬ邪魔者の登場により、関くんが大ピンチに！？

6.SummaryEnglish: Today is a disaster drill. Seki-kun would at least be serious at a time like this... or so Yokoi-san thought before her expectations were shattered. What is that? A r-robot?!
6.SummaryJapanese: 今日は避難訓練。こんな時くらいはさすがの関くんも真面目に…っと言う、横井さんの淡い期待ははかなく散る…何それ？ロ、ロボット！？

7.SummaryEnglish: During class, Yokoi-san notices that there are a lot of notes going around. She looks next to her and sees that there's a lot going on with Seki-kun's desk
7.SummaryJapanese: いつもの授業中。やたらと飛び交う手紙に気付く横井さん。となりを見ると、関くんの机の上がとんでもない事に！？

8.SummaryEnglish: Seki-kun is playing shogi again next to Yokoi-san. Yokoi-san let's her guard down, thinking that she has seen this before but then this leads to an unforeseen event
8.SummaryJapanese: 横井さんのとなりで、パチパチと将棋をうつ聞くん。これは一度見たものだと油断する横井さんだが、これが想像を絶する展開に…！？

9.SummaryEnglish: Seki-kun starts knitting during class. Yokoi-san's hobby is to knit, so she starts feeling a rivalry with Seki-kun. Where will this battle end up?!
9.SummaryJapanese: 授業中に、編み物をする関くん。編み物が趣味の横井さんは、これに激しいライバル心を燃やし始める。果たしてこの勝負の行方は！？

10.SummaryEnglish: During art class, a girl stares intently at Seki-kun and Yokoi-san. Because of her misunderstanding, their relationship takes an interesting turn
10.SummaryJapanese: 美術の時間。関くんと横井さんを見つめる女子生徒の熱視線。彼女の勘違いで、２人の関係がとんでもない方向に！？

11.SummaryEnglish: While Yokoi-san is trying to concentrate on the lesson, Seki-kun suddenly pulls out a bear doll. Yokoi-san is overtaken by its cuteness, but then...
11.SummaryJapanese: 真面目に授業を受ける横井さんのとなりで、おもむろにクマの人形を取り出す関くん。その人形のあまりの可愛さに萌えまくる横井さんだが・・・！？

12.SummaryEnglish: Seki-kun suddenly starts playing with a remote control car on his desk... and seems to actually be studying something. Yokoi-kun sees this but... S-Seki-kun, just what are you studying?!
12.SummaryJapanese: 机の上になぜかラジコンを出している関くん。いつになく真面目に勉強している様子。そんな関くんに気付く横井さんだが・・・。せ、関くん、それ何の勉強！？

13.SummaryEnglish: Today's lesson is at the school's pool. Yokoi-san takes it very seriously, while Seki-kun messes around with his friends... and it appears that some familiar robots are back
13.SummaryJapanese: 今日はプールで救命講習。真面目に取り組む横井さんと、友達とふざけ合う関くん・・・そんな関くんの傍らには見覚えのあるロボットが！？

14.SummaryEnglish: Yokoi-san eats lunch with her friends. She looks over and sees that Seki-kun's lunch is in some deep trouble.
14.SummaryJapanese: お昼休みに楽しく友達とお弁当を食べている横井さん。ふと横を見ると、関くんのお弁当が大変な事に！？

15.SummaryEnglish: It's time for art class and Seki-kun is playing paper sumo. Goto-san sees this and her delusions go the wrong way yet again.
15.SummaryJapanese: 美術の時間、紙ずもうに没頭する関くん。それを観察している後藤さんだが、またしても妄想は間違った方向に・・・！？

16.SummaryEnglish: Seki-kun is playing Shogi yet again in class. Yokoi-san let her guard down, thinking that this would be the same as before but then she sees... chess pieces?!
16.SummaryJapanese: またまた授業中に将棋を並べる関くん。それを見た横井さんは関くんの定番の遊びだと案の定油断をしてしまう。しかし将棋の向かいに並んでいるのは・・・チェ、チェス！？

17.SummaryEnglish: Seki-kun starts playing fuku warai in class... however it wasn't any old normal fuku warai! Yokoi-san is unable to look away from the surprising turn of events!
17.SummaryJapanese: 授業中、福笑いをはじめる関くん。しかしそれはただの福笑いではなかった！度肝を抜く展開に横井さんは目が離せなくなる！？

18.SummaryEnglish: As Yokoi-san is trying to listen seriously in class and Seki-kun starts doing magic tricks next to her. Yokoi-san slowly gets distracted at how good the magic tricks are
18.SummaryJapanese: 授業を真面目に受けたいと願う横井さんのとなりで、手品をはじめる関くん。手品の完成度の高さに、横井さんは授業どころではなくなっていく・・・

19.SummaryEnglish: Yokoi-san gets closer to Seki-kun as he's trying out glasses in class. She starts to think that the glasses are so he can see during class... but that leads to a huge misunderstanding!
19.SummaryJapanese: 授業中、眼鏡をかけている関くんに気付く横井さん。授業中に眼鏡＝勉強をする気になったと思い込む・・・しかしそれは大きな勘違いだった！

20.SummaryEnglish: Seki-kun makes a flipbook during class... and this flipbook... and an amazing story unfolds right before Yokoi-san's eyes.
20.SummaryJapanese: 授業中にパラパラ漫画を作る関くん。このパラパラ漫画が、横井さんを巻き込みながら壮大なストーリーへと展開する！？

21.SummaryEnglish: Yokoi-san talks to her teacher in the faculty room, where she hears that a surprise luggage inspection is going to happen in class. Considering all of the play things Seki-kun has in his bag, he may be in a lot of trouble!
21.SummaryJapanese: 職員室で先生と話しをしていた横井さんは、抜き打ちの持ち物検査が行われる事を知る。鞄の中に遊び道具満載の関くん、絶体絶命のピンチ！？
